frontmatter.title: MicroMasters Program in Statistics and Data Science

node.html:
• 6.431x: Probability - The Science of Uncertainty and Data
  • 6.86x: Machine Learning with Python-From Linear Models to Deep Learning
  • 14.310x: Data Analysis for Social Scientists

• Overall 9.09 CGPA
  • Undertook courses related to Data Science: MAT207: Applied Probability, Statistics and Reliability MAT202: Linear Algebra CSE208: Data Warehousing and Data Mining CSE327: Image and Vision Computing CSE330: Agent Based Intelligent Systems
  • Awarded the Special Achiever Award for outstanding performance in academics, international and national level competitions for academic year 2017-2018.
  • Winner ​at​ We@DS Hackathon 2017 ​held by ​Siemens. Received an internship offer and 150 dollar cash prize.
  • Best Project ​in School of Computer Science, VIT University, Engineers’ Day 2015 for the project titled, ‘Touch Table for University Professors’.

• Acheived an overall 96% in the Grade 12 CBSE examination
  • Received a Gold Medal - Awarded to students for academic excellence for 7 consecutive years.

• Applied AI with DeepLearning
  • Neural Networks and Deep Learning
  • Exploratory Data Analysis With Python and Pandas
  • Merge, Sort and Filter Data in Python Pandas
  • DAT208x: Introduction to Python for Data Science
  • Intermediate Machine Learning
  • Intro to Machine Learning
  • Introduction to AI & ML
